technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Liver appears hypoechoic with no focal lesions.
Thyroid gland shows ill-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Major vessels show mildly thickened waveform on Doppler.
Left ovary demonstrates mildly heterogeneous morphology.
Left kidney shows ill-defined, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 9.57 bpm.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
